name: Void Pool
description:
Game made for the Mini Jam 67.

Theme: Void

Limitation: Game must not contain any enemies

Inputs: "WASD" for movement, mouse to aim and shoot. "R" to restart. "M" to mute the background music.

I make the ugliest art and covers.

This is a game I made in a couple of hours and I kind of like it. It is a pool game where the player had to push or pull stuff into the void. I had a bigger idea for it, but I could only finish the first basic level. I don't know if I should flesh it out or leave it behind. Seems that there is not much to explore with this idea, other than more mutations and silly levels and multiplayer. I had the idea of the big holes shrinking and I kept one of them in just to show where I was heading with this idea. 

I hope You enjoy this short game!
